AccessKubernetesApi.name: AccessKubernetesApi
AccessKubernetesApi.description: Grants permission to view Kubernetes objects via AWS EKS console

AssociateEncryptionConfig.name: AssociateEncryptionConfig
AssociateEncryptionConfig.description: Grants permission to associate encryption configuration to a cluster

AssociateIdentityProviderConfig.name: AssociateIdentityProviderConfig
AssociateIdentityProviderConfig.description: Grants permission to associate an identity provider configuration to a cluster

CreateAddon.name: CreateAddon
CreateAddon.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS add-on

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS cluster

CreateFargateProfile.name: CreateFargateProfile
CreateFargateProfile.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Fargate profile

CreateNodegroup.name: CreateNodegroup
CreateNodegroup.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS Nodegroup

DeleteAddon.name: DeleteAddon
DeleteAddon.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS add-on

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS cluster

DeleteFargateProfile.name: DeleteFargateProfile
DeleteFargateProfile.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Fargate profile

DeleteNodegroup.name: DeleteNodegroup
DeleteNodegroup.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS Nodegroup

DescribeAddon.name: DescribeAddon
DescribeAddon.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS add-on

DescribeAddonVersions.name: DescribeAddonVersions
DescribeAddonVersions.description:
Grants permission to retrieve descriptive version information about the add-ons that
                                                Amazon EKS Add-ons supports

DescribeCluster.name: DescribeCluster
DescribeCluster.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS cluster

DescribeFargateProfile.name: DescribeFargateProfile
DescribeFargateProfile.description:
Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an AWS Fargate profile
                                                associated with a cluster

DescribeIdentityProviderConfig.name: DescribeIdentityProviderConfig
DescribeIdentityProviderConfig.description:
Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Idp config associated
                                                with a cluster

DescribeNodegroup.name: DescribeNodegroup
DescribeNodegroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS nodegroup

DescribeUpdate.name: DescribeUpdate
DescribeUpdate.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a given update for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup/add-on
                                                (in the specified or default region)

DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig.name: DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig
DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig.description: Grants permission to delete an asssociated Idp config

ListAddons.name: ListAddons
ListAddons.description:
Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS add-ons in your AWS account (in the specified
                                                or default region) for a given cluster

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
ListClusters.description:
Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS clusters in your AWS account (in the specified
                                                or default region)

ListFargateProfiles.name: ListFargateProfiles
ListFargateProfiles.description:
Grants permission to list the AWS Fargate profiles in your AWS account (in the specified
                                                or default region) associated with a given cluster

ListIdentityProviderConfigs.name: ListIdentityProviderConfigs
ListIdentityProviderConfigs.description:
Grants permission to list the Idp configs in your AWS account (in the specified or
                                                default region) associated with a given cluster

ListNodegroups.name: ListNodegroups
ListNodegroups.description:
Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS nodegroups in your AWS account (in the specified
                                                or default region) attached to given cluster

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for the specified resource

ListUpdates.name: ListUpdates
ListUpdates.description:
Grants permission to list the updates for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup/add-on
                                                (in the specified or default region)

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource

UpdateAddon.name: UpdateAddon
UpdateAddon.description:
Grants permission to update Amazon EKS add-on configurations, such as the VPC-CNI
                                                version

UpdateClusterConfig.name: UpdateClusterConfig
UpdateClusterConfig.description:
Grants permission to update Amazon EKS cluster configurations (eg: API server endpoint
                                                access)

UpdateClusterVersion.name: UpdateClusterVersion
UpdateClusterVersion.description: Grants permission to update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS cluster

UpdateNodegroupConfig.name: UpdateNodegroupConfig
UpdateNodegroupConfig.description:
Grants permission to update Amazon EKS nodegroup configurations (eg: min/max/desired
                                                capacity or labels)

UpdateNodegroupVersion.name: UpdateNodegroupVersion
UpdateNodegroupVersion.description: Grants permission to update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS nodegroup
